properties.name: itcampus.user.defaultAvatarPath
properties.description: Relative to itcampus.file.directory path, which points to the default user avatar image (is used when a new user is created)

properties.name: itcampus.file.directory
properties.description: Absolute path, which points to the base directory of filesystem file storage

properties.name: itcampus.version
properties.description: Version of the project (is used for swagger documentation)
